testCase.requirementText: A simple rights statement may be used to describe general permissions for the package. Individual representations should state their specific rights in their representation METS file. Available standards include RightsStatements.org , Europeana rights statements info , METS Rights Schema created and maintained by the METS Board, the rights part of PREMIS as well as own local rights statements in use.
testCase.description: This is a MAY requirement and the possibilities are covered by the METS schema, so there is no need to provide further rules (out of scope)
